message.body: Hi!! I'm at work but I miss you; how are you? I'll call as soon as I'm off!
Cool!
Ha! Sorry about that!
Tell me when you are coming to Philadelphia and I will absolutely come to Baltimore ASAP
And I bet you $20 your relationship w charles won't change much- but you will prob meet someone that gives you more and you won't even be that interested by the time that happens
I give it two months, tops
He'll def be 'back' though
Human nature, eh?!

Ok! Email me your new contact info! I plan to head up to ny at some point again this summer and maybe we can see each other then! Of course you are welcome to stay with me ANY TIME. Tell me more about the residency! And I hope you are right about c. I hope he misses me and we figure out a way to make it work.
He will def miss you
And if not, I hope there'll be an even better fit down the road. :)
ï¿¼
It's decent sized too
Maybe 2 ft by 2 ft?
Maybe a bit more
You'll find a better fit ANd he'll still be there- I promise
It's really obvious from the narrative of your relationship so far
Aw, hon. I dunno. After no sex atall for the nine days we were together? I dunno. I sure hope you're right. And I am really looking forward to seeing you!
Oh my god!!!!
It just came through!!!
Jesus!!!!
Lol it's not done
And it looks so fresh
But it looks pretty awesome in person lol
Unbelievable!!!!
I can't wait to see it
How big? Is that the 2 foot?
It's gorgeous!!!!!!!!
What were you looking at? What got you there?
The light, the narrative and nuance!!!! Shit!!! everything in that painting works. What else will you do with it???
It has a strange boterro / balthus narrative feel (not formally, but emotionally?)
I found the Louisville 21c museum hotel btw online!
Oooh it Does look good ; looks like it's rated really well!
Definitely those two- but also porter. And, you're gonna think I'm nuts, but there's something ucello-ish.
In the painting if it-there's a lovely translucence, like Diebenkorn's ocean parks
That's a wild place. It was quite good. A good ratio of real stuff to schlock
Not that there wasn't schlock, but there was less of it and it was a sort if higher quality schlock.
